verses.text: \w Whosoever|strong="G3956"\w* \w believeth|strong="G4100"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* the \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* is \w born|strong="G1080"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* every \w one|strong="G3956"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w loveth|strong="G0025"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w* that \w begat|strong="G1080"\w* \w loveth|strong="G0025"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* that is \w begotten|strong="G1080"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w By|strong="G1722"\w* \w this|strong="G5129"\w* we \w know|strong="G1097"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* we \w love|strong="G0025"\w* the \w children|strong="G5043"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w when|strong="G3752"\w* we \w love|strong="G0025"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w keep|strong="G5083"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w commandments|strong="G1785"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* the \w love|strong="G0026"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* we \w keep|strong="G5083"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w commandments|strong="G1785"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w commandments|strong="G1785"\w* \w are|strong="G1526"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w grievous|strong="G0926"\w*.

\w For|strong="G3754"\w* \w whatsoever|strong="G3956"\w* is \w born|strong="G1080"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w overcometh|strong="G3528"\w* the \w world|strong="G2889"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* the \w victory|strong="G3529"\w* that \w overcometh|strong="G3528"\w* the \w world|strong="G2889"\w*, \add even\add* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*.

\w Who|strong="G5101"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* he that \w overcometh|strong="G3528"\w* the \w world|strong="G2889"\w*, \w but|strong="G1487"\w* he that \w believeth|strong="G4100"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* the \w Son|strong="G5207"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*?

\w This|strong="G3778"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* he that \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w water|strong="G5204"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w blood|strong="G0129"\w*, \add even\add* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*; \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w water|strong="G5204"\w* \w only|strong="G3440"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w water|strong="G5204"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w blood|strong="G0129"\w*. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* it \w is|strong="G2076"\w* the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* that beareth \w witness|strong="G3140"\w*, \w because|strong="G3754"\w* the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w truth|strong="G0225"\w*.

\w For|strong="G3754"\w* there \w are|strong="G1526"\w* \w three|strong="G5140"\w* that bear \w record|strong="G3140"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w*, the \w Father|strong="G3962"\w*, the \w Word|strong="G3056"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w Holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w Ghost|strong="G4151"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w three|strong="G5140"\w* \w are|strong="G1526"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* there \w are|strong="G1526"\w* \w three|strong="G5140"\w* that bear \w witness|strong="G3140"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*, the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w water|strong="G5204"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w blood|strong="G0129"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w these|strong="G3588"\w* \w three|strong="G5140"\w* \w agree|strong="G1526"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w*.

\w If|strong="G1487"\w* we \w receive|strong="G2983"\w* the \w witness|strong="G3141"\w* of \w men|strong="G0444"\w*, the \w witness|strong="G3141"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w greater|strong="G3187"\w*: \w for|strong="G3754"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* the \w witness|strong="G3141"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* he hath \w testified|strong="G3140"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w Son|strong="G5207"\w*.

He that \w believeth|strong="G4100"\w* \w on|strong="G1519"\w* the \w Son|strong="G5207"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w hath|strong="G2192"\w* the \w witness|strong="G3141"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w himself|strong="G1438"\w*: he that \w believeth|strong="G4100"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* hath \w made|strong="G4160"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* a \w liar|strong="G5583"\w*; \w because|strong="G3754"\w* he \w believeth|strong="G4100"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* the \w record|strong="G3141"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w gave|strong="G3140"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w Son|strong="G5207"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* the \w record|strong="G3141"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* hath \w given|strong="G1325"\w* to \w us|strong="G2254"\w* \w eternal|strong="G0166"\w* \w life|strong="G2222"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w life|strong="G2222"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w Son|strong="G5207"\w*.

He that \w hath|strong="G2192"\w* the \w Son|strong="G5207"\w* \w hath|strong="G2192"\w* \w life|strong="G2222"\w*; \add and\add* he that \w hath|strong="G2192"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* the \w Son|strong="G5207"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w hath|strong="G2192"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w life|strong="G2222"\w*.

These \w things|strong="G5023"\w* have I \w written|strong="G1125"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5213"\w* that \w believe|strong="G4100"\w* \w on|strong="G1519"\w* the \w name|strong="G3686"\w* of the \w Son|strong="G5207"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*; \w that|strong="G2443"\w* ye may \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* ye \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w eternal|strong="G0166"\w* \w life|strong="G2222"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* ye may \w believe|strong="G4100"\w* \w on|strong="G1519"\w* the \w name|strong="G3686"\w* of the \w Son|strong="G5207"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* the \w confidence|strong="G3954"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* we \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w in|strong="G4314"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w*, \w if|strong="G1437"\w* we \w ask|strong="G0154"\w* any \w thing|strong="G5100"\w* according \w to|strong="G2596"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w will|strong="G2307"\w*, he \w heareth|strong="G0191"\w* \w us|strong="G2257"\w*:

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w if|strong="G1437"\w* we \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* he \w hear|strong="G0191"\w* \w us|strong="G2257"\w*, \w whatsoever|strong="G3739"\w* we \w ask|strong="G0154"\w*, we \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* we \w have|strong="G2192"\w* the \w petitions|strong="G0155"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* we \w desired|strong="G0154"\w* \w of|strong="G3844"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w If|strong="G1437"\w* any \w man|strong="G5100"\w* \w see|strong="G1492"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w brother|strong="G0080"\w* \w sin|strong="G0264"\w* a \w sin|strong="G0266"\w* \add which is\add* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w death|strong="G2288"\w*, he shall \w ask|strong="G0154"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* he shall \w give|strong="G1325"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w life|strong="G2222"\w* for them that \w sin|strong="G0264"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w death|strong="G2288"\w*. There \w is|strong="G2076"\w* a \w sin|strong="G0266"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w death|strong="G2288"\w*: I \w do|strong="G3004"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w say|strong="G3004"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* he shall \w pray|strong="G2065"\w* \w for|strong="G4012"\w* \w it|strong="G1565"\w*.

\w All|strong="G3956"\w* \w unrighteousness|strong="G0093"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w sin|strong="G0266"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* there \w is|strong="G2076"\w* a \w sin|strong="G0266"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w death|strong="G2288"\w*.

We \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w whosoever|strong="G3956"\w* is \w born|strong="G1080"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w sinneth|strong="G0264"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w*; \w but|strong="G0235"\w* he that is \w begotten|strong="G1080"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w keepeth|strong="G5083"\w* \w himself|strong="G1438"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* wicked \w one|strong="G4190"\w* \w toucheth|strong="G0680"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w*.

\add And\add* we \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* we \w are|strong="G2070"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w whole|strong="G3650"\w* \w world|strong="G2889"\w* \w lieth|strong="G2749"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w wickedness|strong="G4190"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* we \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* the \w Son|strong="G5207"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* is \w come|strong="G2240"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* hath \w given|strong="G1325"\w* \w us|strong="G2254"\w* an \w understanding|strong="G1271"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* we may \w know|strong="G1097"\w* him that is \w true|strong="G0228"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* we \w are|strong="G2070"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* him that is \w true|strong="G0228"\w*, \add even\add* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w Son|strong="G5207"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*. \w This|strong="G3778"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* the \w true|strong="G0228"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w eternal|strong="G0166"\w* \w life|strong="G2222"\w*.
Little \w children|strong="G5040"\w*, \w keep|strong="G5442"\w* \w yourselves|strong="G1438"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w idols|strong="G1497"\w*. \w Amen|strong="G0281"\w*.
